Harold and Joyce Pomeroy Schwartz Public Art Archive

front cover: Silvio Wolf, Selected Works inside cover: 1-Public Art Works: Biography, 1987-Grande Muro Occidentale, 1990-Scala Reale, 199-Ikonenwerk, 1996-L'Osservanza, 1997-Stazione di Berlino, 1998-Luogo Parola, 1999-Grida dal Tempio, 1999-The Elsewhere, 2000-Annunciation, 2001-Angeli del Tempo, 2003-Loggia delle Parole, 2004-Pietra d'Aqua. 2-Site-Specific Installations: Biography, 1991-Stelle Braille, 1992-Baden-Baden, 1993-Laboratorio, 1995-Luci Bianche, 1996-Iconostasi, 1997-Ricreazione, 1999-Chantier-Marche', 1999-LaZone d'Ombre, 2001-Fondazione del Tempo, 2002-Oggi. 3-Photo Works: Biography, 01-Icons of Light, 02-Angels of Time, 03-Scala Zero, 04-Skylights, 05-Thresholds, 06-Horizons, 07-John 14. back cover: Silvio Wolf - VIA COMPAGNONI 3 - 20129 MILANO - ITALY, Tel/fax: +39.02713079, email: info@silviowolf.com
Harold and Joyce Pomeroy Schwartz Public Art Archive
